trends: There have been 10 other sightings in West Chester
There were no other sightings in West Chester on or around August 24th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsScanning the sky my son and I noticed what seemed to be a bright star but it was constantly changing color. We got the binoculars and could see it was a constant twinkling of red, green blue and white lights - it was stationary in the sky for about 45 minutes and then disappeard. We were standing outside the front door of my home We noticed the object due to the brightness and unusual colors We first thought it was a plane coming at us but it never moved We continued to observe the object - we flashed a laser at it and it seemed to cause the laser light to start pulsing. We watched it for about 30 to 40 minutes went into the house for a minute came back out and it was gone
Summary: Stationary in the sky too low for star Multuple colors blue gree red
